grad_power.title: Grad Power
grad_power.description: Use gradient in power dimension instead of time

frequency_range.title: Frequency Range
frequency_range.description: Frequency range for the beat detection

points.title: Points
points.description: How many historical points to capture

mask_stretch.title: Mask Stretch
mask_stretch.description: How to stretch the mask source pixles to the effect pixels

mask.title: Mask
mask.description: The virtual from which to source the mask

foreground.title: Foreground
foreground.description: The virtual from which to source the foreground

background.title: Background
background.description: The virtual from which to source the background

mask_cutoff.title: Mask Cutoff
mask_cutoff.description: 1 default = luminance as alpha, anything below 1 is mask cutoff

count.title: Count
count.description: Number of code lines in the matrix as a multiplier of matrix pixel width

add_speed.title: Add Speed
add_speed.description: Number of code lines to add per second

width.title: Width
width.description: Width of code lines as % of matrix

run_seconds.title: Run Seconds
run_seconds.description: Minimum number of seconds for a code line to run from top to bottom

tail.title: Tail
tail.description: Code line tail length as a % of the matrix

impulse_decay.title: Impulse Decay
impulse_decay.description: Decay filter applied to the impulse for development

color_cycler.title: Color Cycler
color_cycler.description: Change colors in time with the beat

mixing_mode.title: Mixing Mode
mixing_mode.description: Mode of combining each frequencies' colors

peak_percent.title: Peak Percent
peak_percent.description: Size of the tracer bar that follows a filtered value

peak_decay.title: Peak Decay
peak_decay.description: Decay filter applied to the peak value

peak_marks.description: Turn on white peak markers that follow a freq value filtered with decay

max_vs_mean.title: Max Vs Mean
max_vs_mean.description: Use max or mean value for bar size

spin_decay.title: Spin Decay
spin_decay.description: Decay filter applied to the spin impulse

roll_speed.title: Roll Speed
roll_speed.description: 0= no gradient roll, range 60 secs to 1 sec

boost.title: Boost
boost.description: Boost the brightness of the effect on a parabolic curve

intensity.title: Intensity
intensity.description: Application of the audio power input

health_checks.title: Health Checks
health_checks.description: Check for and correct common unhealthy states

base_game_speed.title: Base Game Speed
base_game_speed.description: Base number of steps per second to run

health_check_interval.title: Health Check Interval

impulse_decay.description: Decay filter applied to the life generation impulse

brightness_boost.description: Boost the brightness of the effect on a parabolic curve

threshold_lows.title: Threshold Lows

threshold_mids.description: If Mids are below this value, Highs are used

switch_time.description: Time Lows/Mids have to be below threshold before switch

frequency_range.title: Frequency Range
frequency_range.description: Frequency range for the beat detection

multiplier.title: Multiplier
multiplier.description: Applied to the audio input to amplify effect

min_size.title: Min Size
min_size.description: The minimum size multiplier for the image

bilinear.title: Bilinear
bilinear.description: default NEAREST, use BILINEAR for smoother scaling, expensive on runtime takes a few ms

spin.title: Spin
spin.description: spin image according to filter impulse

clip.title: Clip

resize_method.description: What strategy to use when resizing GIF

stretch_horizontal.title: Stretch Horizontal

skip_frames.description: Frames to remove from gif animation

keep_aspect_ratio.description: Preserve aspect ratio if force fit

ping_pong.description: Play gif forward and reverse, not just loop

half_beat.description: half the beat input impulse, slow things down

frequency_range.description: Frequency range for the beat detection

color_intensity.description: Adjust color intensity based on audio power

attack.title: Attack
attack.description: Filter damping on attack, lower number is more

decay.title: Decay
decay.description: Filter damping on decay, lower number is more

filter.title: Filter
filter.description: Enable damping filters on attack and decay

threshold.title: Threshold
threshold.description: Cutoff for quiet sounds. Higher -> only loud sounds are detected

scroll_per_sec.title: Scroll Per Sec

decay_per_sec.description: Decay rate of the scroll per second, kind of

threshold.title: Threshold
threshold.description: Cutoff for quiet sounds. Higher -> only loud sounds are detected

intensity.title: Intensity
intensity.description: Audio injection to speed [0..2] 0 = free run

frequency_range.description: Frequency range for the audio impulse

rgb_mix.description: How the melbank filters are applied to the RGB values

strobe_decay.description: How rapidly a single strobe hit fades. Higher -> faster fade

beat_decay.description: How much the strobes fade across the beat. Higher -> less bright strobes towards end of beat

peak_decay.title: Peak Decay
peak_decay.description: Decay filter applied to raw volume to track peak, 0 is None

max_volume.description: Cut off limit for max volume warning

max_vs_mean.description: Use max or mean value for bar size
